name: Modern Man Championship (JXVD)
description:
A platform fighter meant to be played with friends.

Xbox Controller support only

Controls

A - Jump

X - Movement Special

Y - Attack Special

Rb - Attack

Lb - Shield

Character Abilities

xXDarkBlade420Xx
----------------------------------------

Movement Special - Dash, can do up to 3 before needing to touch the ground

Attack Special - Big Swing

Hitomi

----------------------------------------

Movement Special - Dash, can do them indefinitely if your timing is great, refreshes on ground touch

Attack Special - Sword Throw

Sharon

----------------------------------------

Movement Special - Invincible Roll

Attack Special - Bottle Toss, stuns opponent

Big Body
----------------------------------------

Movement Special - Killing Dash

Attack Special - Slow Sword
